name: Shakshuka
desc: Eggs poached in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce, served with fresh bread.

name: Foul Mudammas
desc: Stewed fava beans with olive oil, lemon, and spices. Served with pita.

name: Chicken Kabsa
desc: Traditional Saudi rice dish with spiced chicken, vegetables, and nuts.

name: Lamb Mandi
desc: Tender lamb cooked with fragrant rice and a blend of Arabic spices.

name: Sambousek
desc: Crispy pastry filled with spiced meat or cheese.

name: Hummus
desc: Creamy chickpea dip with tahini, olive oil, and lemon.

name: Kunafa
desc: Sweet cheese pastry soaked in syrup, topped with pistachios.

name: Baklava
desc: Layers of filo pastry, nuts, and honey syrup.

name: Family Combo
desc: Kabsa, Mandi, Sambousek, Hummus, and Kunafa. Serves 4.

name: Lunch Combo
desc: Chicken Kabsa, Sambousek, and a soft drink.
